definition: to hold things up/to make a botch of things

sentences.english: Judging by appearances can be misleading.
sentences.chinese: 憑外表判斷是會誤事的。

sentences.english: For the sake of your health, please don't drink too much wine.
sentences.chinese: 杯中之物不要多飲，否則既傷身體也容易誤事。

sentences.english: Country must be messy in his hands.
sentences.chinese: 國家在他手裏一定會誤事的。

sentences.english: I only wanted to help, and forgot that more people would delay it in turn.
sentences.chinese: 我一心只想幫忙，忘記了人多反而誤事。
